statements: DELETE FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_name = 'Annual Conference' AND attendance_status = 'confirmed';
DELETE FROM EventAttendance WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01' AND attendee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM event_attendance WHERE event_id = 100 AND participant_id = 1;
DELETE FROM event_participants WHERE event_id = (SELECT event_id FROM event_attendance WHERE event_name = 'Conference');
DELETE FROM event_location WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM event_attendance WHERE event_id = 100 AND attendance_count < 50;
DELETE FROM event_location WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
DELETE FROM Event_Participants WHERE participant_id IN (SELECT participant_id FROM Event_Participants WHERE participant_name = 'Alice');
